name: Junit-tests-bank-account
tagline: This is an open source initiative
body:
### Tutorial and tips on JUnit
This is the first of the series I will be working on for the next months. Due to the fact that most content with good quality are provided in english, I decided to start publishing what I have been learning in my mother language in which is Brazilian Portuguese.

You guys can create issues in order to have questions answered and follow the other tutorials through my website [augustovictor](http://augustovictor.com)

**Star** it if you liked and share with friends.
Thanks you all o/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
